name: Let Them Be Eaten By Bears
categories: Let Them Be Eaten By Bears
description: This guide, based on the author’s acclaimed Integrated Outdoor Program, will inspire your kids to enjoy nature and appreciate the great outdoors. Drawing from his personal and professional background as an educator, guide, writer, and father, Peter Hoffmeister puts the emphasis on fun rather than fear. Get introduced (or reintroduced) to hiking, camping, and all-around exploring with an approachable book that empowers parents and kids.
